title: A Game of Malice and Greed
description: A twisted heart, a hollow soul.A broken warrior, lost gods of old.A thief of shadows, blessed with light,A single lie which stole their might.A princess to win, in a brutal game.A great empire falling to a monsterâ€™s claim.A forbidden love, a curse untold.The last immortal trapped in a coin of gold.
author: Caroline Peckham
